body_content.explanation: to change something from one position to another, or to exchange the positions of two things:
examples: In their latest production they have reworked "King Lear", transposing it to pre-colonial Africa.
The confusion was caused when two numbers were accidentally transposed by someone in the Social Security office.

body_content.explanation: to play or write a piece of music in a different key (= set of musical notes based on a particular note) from the one used originally:
examples: The pianist transposed the song into C.
